website_summaries.verdict: This compact carpet sweeper  is not limited to light home duty. If excessive noise is an issue, this model is a great alternative to loud vacuum cleaners or powered sweepers for spot cleaning or emergencies.
pros: Very compact and lightweight, ideal for spot cleaning and small, dry messes
Performs well in picking up dog and cat hair from the carpet
Very quiet relative to other models
cons: Debris storage is limited, so users may not want to use it for larger carpet sweeping jobs

customer_reviews.title: Tried and tested in a family childcare.
customer_reviews.text: I have a family childcare and needed a replacement for a Bissell floor sweeper (electric, wireless). Kids are messy- especially when you have six kids eating at once! This was purchased to exclusively be used under and around the table. The floor is sheet laminate. It picks up about 60% of food on the ground, but skips over most things smaller than a cheerio. Crumbs? Forgetaboutit. Under cabinets? No way. Corners? Just pushes the food into the corner, and then you can't reach it. I had high hopes, but this thing did not live up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: MDBVT

customer_reviews.title: just doesnt' work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on several of the reviews here, but man, those people must have been using another product.... this was a very frustrating experience! you can run it back and forth and back and forth, but it just will not pick up little scraps of paper or the tiny things you want to pick up off the kitchen floor. Maybe its somehow picking up dirt and cat hair I dont' see, but the things I DO see it was just pushing around... so skip this one, I'd say!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Allen Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Handy sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I have two cats. Cats = fur + litter grains + fear of vacuum cleaner + laziness of cat owner = REALLY disgusting rugs. Et volia'...the manual sweeper by Rubbermaid. Brilliant! Of course it isn't as efficient as the electric vacuum cleaner, but it keeps me from being knee deep in cat feathers and dust bunnies until I get ambitious enough to actually drag the heavy beast out of the closet and terrify my kitties. Easy to use, easy to store, does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Eventually Gets the Job Done - Sorta
customer_reviews.text: MEH!! Model 4215-88 with the rubber blades. For 70 or 80 bucks it oughta be a LOT more efficient. Use it on hardwood and tile and low carpet, in that order. Fair to good on hardwood and tile, forgettaboutit on carpet - but that's the rubber blades. I bought it for hard surfaces. AND to add insult to injury, Rubbermaid does not make replacement parts for this pricey item. Hoky makes a similar sweeper for less AND has replacement parts available. Back this one goes!
customer_reviews.author: FotoMeister

customer_reviews.title: Worst sweeper I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I chose the Rubber Maid due to the double brush. I wish I had tried it out before tossing the box. It is pretty useless. The other sweepers were all pretty good but I thought I'd try something new--double brushes. I will have to order another one from a different company, this one simply does not pick up unless I stand on the top and or kneel and push hard on the housing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna G.

customer_reviews.title: This sweeper aggravates better than it cleans.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sweeper in addition to two other (different brand) less expensive sweepers I already use. We use them in an office environment. They are used for light cleaning between vacuums on mostly hard floor and low pile building grade carpet. The Rubbermaid Commercial sweeper is a poor performer on both. I have to run over the same spots repeatedly just to pick up the easiest particles. I can come in with my cheaper sweepers and they pick it right up. I thought for the price and the use of the words "commercial grade" I was getting a tool to make cleaning easier. Not so much. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my classroom that has a very low pile carpet. It worked very well. I even had other teachers asking to borrow it. I like to keep my classroom tidy and for the price this seemed to help out a great deal. However, after about a month, the plastic fibers on the brush start to become useless. They get disfigured and point in directions they're not supposed to. Now only half of the sweeper is actually picking these up. The tool I was using to help keep my classroom clean became a source of more frustration, and now sits in a corner until I can find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Review For This Model : Rubbermaid Commercial FG421388BLA Dual Action Mechanical Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Decent sweeper that unfortunately has a problem with the pole unscrewing constantly as the sweeper is twisted and turned during use. The unscrewing of the pole can be solved by using Loctite threadlocker. The pole design is built in multiple sections to facilitate low shipping cost. It has certainly made the sweeper aggravating to use. Hopefully the Loctite will result in a long term solution.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great little sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have cats and I am sick of vacuuming constantly. I can just sweep it over crumbs, fur and litter and make them disappear. I am disappointed that it wont pick up the bits of carpet that come off of the scratching post but Overall I am still happy. I like seeing how much comes out of it when I empty it after use. It is impressive. I chose this product because we use one at work to pick up leaves that get tracked in and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to tidy up the office I work for when running a vacuum would not be possible during busy hours with customers around. Works amazingly on commercial carpet as well as vinyl flooring. Picks up the smallest of debris, usually with one pass. Fits under furniture with ease.
customer_reviews.author: SHANDA LANSER

customer_reviews.title: Simple machine that simply works
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for quick pick up of random crumbs and hair. Loses one star for failure of quality control at base threading division of Peoples Small Appliance Handle Factory number 267. There weren’t any threads in the handle base’s plastic insert that screws the handle to the unit itself. Two minutes work with an 8-1.25mm tap fixed the problem. Overall pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Al and Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good for specific situations
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of my grandma's sweeper. This is great on indoor-outdoor carpeting and for super low-pile area rugs, bath mats, etc., and it's easier than having to haul out the vacuum. It doesn't work on slick floors or deep pile carpets. My only criticism is that as the handle screws onto the ase you may need to give it an occasional twist.
customer_reviews.author: J Fairlight

customer_reviews.title: Commercial? Maybe if it didn’t have plastic parts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to use once in a while. Commercial implies it could hold up to a lot of use, this will not. I’ve used it to clean a living room, dining room and kitchen areas a few times and already it wants multiple swipes again and again to pick stuff up. If you only plan to use this occasionally then it’s a great item for the price. If you want to use it daily I don’t think it will last very long, too many plastic parts that just won’t last.
customer_reviews.author: V. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quiet, no noise to wake my husband late at night.
customer_reviews.text: Put it together out of the box today. Meager instructions so clue for you.... First Screw the bottom portion of the handle onto the sweeper then screw the rest as needed to finish putting it together. It works just like I remember the old carpet sweepers at our office. Two dust bins need to be emptied after extensive use or if picking up soft fluffy fuzz immediately. It was either purchase this or buy stock in sticky garment rollers.
customer_reviews.author: WXYZ

customer_reviews.title: Use It Every Day
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother had a sweeper when I was a kid. I hadn't thought of it until I saw this Rubbermaid Sweeper on sale on Prime Day. What a convenient thing to have! You can do a quick "vacuum" of your carpets without hauling out the vacuum cleaner. It transitions from carpet to hard floor with ease. This sweeper picks up really well, even pet hair and cat litter. I use it every day. As a matter of fact, I bought a second one for my parents who are in their 70s. The only negative thing I would say is that it doesn't work great along walls or in corners. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya S Watterson

customer_reviews.title: disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I got it to pick up kitty litter from my carpet area and hard wood floors. It picked up after several passes on the hard wood and I do mean several. It also picked up the litter on the carpeted area after several passes, but any hair that was on the carpet got pushed around by the roller blades enough that it turned them into visibly large dust bunnies that stuck to the carpet and the rubbermaid will not pick them up at all. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sweeper for a specific reason: to clean my indoor/outdoor rugs and my house rugs like runners and area rugs. It is designed for low carpet and it works well for these rugs. I am surprised as to how much the dirt container holds. I have purchased several other brands of cordless electric brooms and sweepers to use for these rugs and they never picked up as well as the Rubbermaid Commercial Sweeper picks up. The part I like the best is that I don't have to charge it to use it. I did research before I purchased this sweeper and I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SHER SAYS

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid Sweeper Model FG421588
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid feeling floor sweeper that works well on carpet and solid floors. I bought it based on the reviews I read and chose it over models using a rotating bristle brush. It is easy to empty out and picks up well. I've only had it a month but I feel that years from now it will still perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The Bissell product is much better. I ordered this one first
customer_reviews.text: The Bissell product is much better. I ordered this one first, to sweep small debris from my covered front porch that is line with short-piled indoor/outdoor carpet, but it doesn't pick up near as much as the Bissell product I ordered subsequent to this product. After receiving this one, and not liking it, I ordered a different brand/model, but then went on vacation and wasn't able to return the inferior Rubbermaid product - bummer, cuz I've bought both. Buy the Bissell brand, you'll be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm on carpet but not so great on ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean my area rugs since I have all hardwood. Works like a charm on carpet but not so great on hardwood or tile. Little hard to tip it up and dispense the junk in the collector compartment too. I find myself taking it outside to empty it because its to awkward to do so in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Pushes things around, does not pick them up. Emptying is awkward and awful. Had to stick my fingers in to get out what little it did pick up. My mother had one of these (a different brand) that worked beautifully. I am returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Works super good for big families!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOOVE this thing! We are a family of 9. This is awesome for a quick tidy without having to plug in the vacuum etc. Used it at a resort and hubby bought one when we got home. Awesome🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: CJrMom

customer_reviews.title: No parts replaceable, not as good as the smaller Bissell, but cost ~$15 more. Made in China.
customer_reviews.text: No parts replaceable, not as good as the smaller Bissell, but cost ~$15 more. Made in China. The Bissell sweep up unit, smaller version, picks up dirt and fiber with much less effort. The Rubbermaid gets it up eventually, but with a lot more back-and-forth to do the job...
customer_reviews.author: Q.C. Stickler

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cleaning tool
customer_reviews.text: So many things to love about this. Lightweight, but it really picks up the dirt. Don't know how deep the cleaning is, but I'm happy for quick jobs. And emptying it is a dream. Can do it with just one hand. The panel on the bottom says "push," and it opens easily to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Petesweet

customer_reviews.title: but it works fine for us bc our apt is small
customer_reviews.text: I use this sweeper for carpet, hardwood, & tiled floor. No, it doesn't pick up every little bit off the floors, but it works fine for us bc our apt is small. (Our old vacuum broke.) It feels great on the carpet & brushes it very satisfactorily. The handle is metal so it adds weight to the thing & doesn't feel cheap. We don't have pets but I shed hair like a cat & this picks it up pretty well, which I'll take despite it being a pain to clean off of the bottom (normal trash/dust empties easily). It also comes with a small toothy comb to help clean the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart in a week
customer_reviews.text: The product works for about a week or 2 then completely falls apart. I bought 4 for my restaurant and after 2 months they have all completely fallen apart. The handle isn’t even threaded correctly half of the time. Without excessive use of duct tape it would be a miracle if these last more than a week. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper.
customer_reviews.text: Sweeps great for a quick cleaning. Doesn't do so well on corners and trimmings (must sweep with broom to catch debris). Sweeps up dog hair like no tomorrow. Love that there is a dual waste compartment. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: During vacation I stayed at resort they had this in the room my lil one made a huge mess and it cleaned it up so well better than a vacuum that I purchased this for my home. I use this item every day. Works fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Nelson R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing that these have fallen in popularity They are so easy to use for fast pick ups. My vacuum is too hard on my hand knotted rugs. This is great for in between pick ups.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gold

customer_reviews.title: Not commercial grade.
customer_reviews.text: Was good while it lasted, but didn't last long. It lasted about 3 months. This is supposed to be a commercial sweeper, certainly not. It's almost like it had an expiration date. It started to be less efficient at picking up then it began to fall apart... from body to handle. Pretty disappointed in the lack of longevity and overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZADDICT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as well as other models from same company
customer_reviews.text: I recently when on vacation to a time share in Florida. There was a Rubbermaid carpet sweeper there that was amazing! I had send myself a message but I forgot the item number. It look the same so I thought I had it but this definitely is not the same. I have to go over items multiple times And it fills up when it shouldn't even be close leaving behind whatever was inside. Quite disappointed being the other one worked so well. I'm my just call the hotel to find out the correct model perion
customer_reviews.author: Katie oxner

customer_reviews.title: This manual sweeper is the best..
customer_reviews.text: This manual sweeper is the best...picks up EVERYTHING and I have multiple dogs/cats. I had previously purchased the Bissell brand because of the name....it was horrible and pieces fell off. This product is well made and I use every day in an 8 room house!
customer_reviews.author: pcn1

customer_reviews.title: Works well for lower pile rugs
customer_reviews.text: This carpet sweeper does a good job with relatively flat rugs and carpets. It does not do much on bare floors. Thicker pile carpets and rugs can be cleaned enough to put off full vacuuming when in a hurry, but it does not pick up all those gray hairs I am shedding these days very well. I like to use this for entry rugs and lower pile carpet, like a wool oriental-design large rug I have in a traffic area. I would purchase it again as it is light and easy to handle when I just can't face dragging out the vacuum cleaner and want to spruce things up.
customer_reviews.author: sallly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to empty, no cord!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for carpet dirt in between vacuuming. Picks up Kitty litter!
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Sweeper has met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats and were always needing to get the vac out to clean up cat hair. The sweeper is easy and convient to usel. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Osga

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well and built to last.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for our place of worship to tidy up after the meetings. It does a very nice job on the low pile carpet, floor matts as well as the ceramic tile. It seems to be built to last, should work for us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Flyboy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do the job for me
customer_reviews.text: This works ok on thick pile carpets. On bare floors it only picks up material on a forward pass. On my low pile carpet it just spreads things around. For whatever reason, I dislike wrapping the cord up on my vacuum cleaner so I wanted a cordless sweeper that would do a quick pick-up of dog hair and grass that the dog brings in. This isn't the one.
customer_reviews.author: K. LaDow

customer_reviews.title: Does the job without the pesky need to be recharged.
customer_reviews.text: For a "commercial" unit...it's still a bit flimsy. But it does the job without the pesky need to be recharged. These are the carpet sweepers are mother's used to pick up a bit of this, a spill of cereal, a smattering of pet hair...all without needing electricity. Works like a charm and QUIET. A bit pricey considering that their construction is certainly NOT what I would consider "commercial" grade...but it fills the bill.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised. I spilled dirt on the floor and this push vacuum picked it up. It even lucks up bird seed. My next gift to gal pals!
customer_reviews.author: aztxcyn

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our office to clean up in the reception area near where we have a shredder. Works great! I thought it looked really small right out of the box but it is a great size for a small area and really picks up all the little pieces of paper. I did have a little problem getting the first piece attached but I was persistent and finally got it to screw in place. Easy to store. I would definitely recommend it for carpeting to pick up shreds of paper.
customer_reviews.author: cegsway

customer_reviews.title: Not as good at cleaning as hoped
customer_reviews.text: Does pick up a good deal of floor debris but cannot seem to get all of it. Even after multiple attempts. Just does a 1 1/2 star job on wood and 2 1/2 stars on thin to medium depth carpet. Does not work on deep carpet. Good for a quick swipe around the table after a meal, especially with youngsters but not a good tool for an adult household.
customer_reviews.author: Lon

customer_reviews.title: This works but not great
customer_reviews.text: It kind of works. It's not as good as an actual powered vacuum, but if you need to vacuum when people are around, and you can make noise. This works.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Merena

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I bought this because my dog leaves crumbs on the carpet every time she eats a treat and I was tired of pulling out the vacuum every time. Tried it as soon as I put it together and it worked very well!! I will use this everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely
customer_reviews.text: Works well, picks up most items, easy and convenient. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: OG

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but doesn't always pick up items without repeating use.
customer_reviews.text: This little sweeper is ok, but sometimes doesn't pick up the items on floor. Have to go over area several times.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda C.

customer_reviews.title: The reason I bought this item was I have a ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this item was I have a long haired dog and I thought if I got one of these I wouldn't have vacuum everyday. Well this didn't meet what I thought it was. If I use to get the dog hair off the carpet moving it back and forth the hair just comes out it never makes it to the bin. I have just pick up the hair. I just use it for my wood floors
customer_reviews.author: santabug

customer_reviews.title: this thing works like a, champ
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this thing works like a, champ ! I used it, as soon as I took it out of the box. It got up every speck of debris off the carpet. I highly recommend it ! Open the little tray on the bottom, and had no idea my carpet was that dirty. It's a good investment, for the price. Luv it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Eric Harris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as it does not pick up as well on hard floor as my old one of different brand. The dirt cups come open and dump dirt out when bumped too hard against wall or when going over bump
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this thing! No need to break ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing! No need to break out the heavy upright vacuum just to clean up little messes.
customer_reviews.author: Katumi Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Low tech, but highly efficient
customer_reviews.text: Our carpet is light-colored Berber, so every bit of yard debris tracked in by pets and people tends to show. This sweeper makes it a breeze to touch up high traffic areas without hauling out the noisy vacuum. It's quick and easy to use and simple to empty. I also love that the stable base allows it to tuck away in a corner or closet, without having to prop it on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon Owl

customer_reviews.title: Works well on carpets and hard surface floors.
customer_reviews.text: The manual sweeper arrived in just two days. It appears to be a good cleaning tool but have only used it a couple times since it arrived. There is a comb that car with it to clean the brushes which should be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but won’t last long. It broke in less than a week
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received with hair and carpet fibers on brush
customer_reviews.text: I was mortified when The recipient of this gift opened it up only to find that there was hair in the brush and carpet fibers in the dust pan. Doesn’t anyone check these items before it shipped out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Selective about what it picks up on Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean our home hardwood floors, particularly in the kitchen and dining room. We have young children so sweeping the floor happens a few times a day. I read a ton of reviews and though this was a smart purchased but we were so disappointed with this sweeper that we returned it. It is selective about what it picks up on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: works great. Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, works great. Arrived on time, handle was a little bowed, but I kept it, doesn't effect performance.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a zero, I would. I had had another of these sweepers until it finally fell apart. Replaced that one w/this one, and it's like they weren't even from the same manufacturer. Doesn't pick up anything even after multiple swipes across the same area. Waste of money...
customer_reviews.author: The Orange Parrot

customer_reviews.title: Best one in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 busy resturants...I have to buy new floor sweepers often. I was frustrated with the options that had through my normal vendors...so I tried Amazon. These sweepers are significantly better than what I have bought in the past....and the price was ver reasonable. So far I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Dave n Angie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, simple to use, great size
customer_reviews.text: So simple and easy to use. Picks up just about everything. Easy to empty debris and crumbs. Size goes in between everything
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: ... I ended up buying one for home because it's great for small messes that don't require a vacume
customer_reviews.text: Used to use these at work so I ended up buying one for home because it's great for small messes that don't require a vacume. Also I hate brooms and this thing does a better job anyways. Brush model works best on carpet but still does a decent job on hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Why

customer_reviews.title: old style carpet sweeper works great
customer_reviews.text: Great little gadget. I got one to keep my rented small office tidy, since it didn't seem to warrant schlepping the vacuum cleaner very frequently. This did a great job of picking up little bits of dust, debris, dog hair (I take the dog to work), crumbs and other miscellaneous stuff. It's so easy to take out and run it back and forth quickly over the carpet. Very quiet, of course, since it does not have a motor. You provide the power. It's fun, actually.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Carpet Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: It works like my grandmothers old carpet sweeper. Works well on short knap carpets and bare floors picking up cat hair and "tracked in" items from outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: After I'd ordered the floor sweeper, I was a little skeptical with regards about how it would work. I was impressed how well it picks up the little stuff in between major vacuuming. It cleans the edges surprisingly well. Best part is no cord or batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Easy to use. Picked up an impressive amount of debris and dirt from carpets and from linoleum. If you want to get the edges of your floors, the thresholds where the texture varies, or very fine particles, you still want a vacuum. But this is great for most everyday messes and maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: A Good Performer
customer_reviews.text: This carpet sweeper is very easy to use. So far it seems to do a good job picking up visible crumbs, hair, etc from our rugs. We haven't as yet used it on our wood floors. Easy to assemble (need only to screw handle 3 pieces together and then screw on to connect handle to sweeper,) and is light and easy to maneuver. It stores easily taking up only about 3 inches in re depth.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald  Sugarman

customer_reviews.title: Those are my kindest words..  Thank You!!
customer_reviews.text: I probably expected way more than I should have, but the Brand and the word Commercial, should speak for the quality! 3=5 passes over the floor mess with this unit should have done at last what one pass did with my old cordless Shark did with ONE pass!! BUT!!Enough said!! "Rubbermaid Commercial 421288B Excecutive Series"
customer_reviews.author: GPICK

customer_reviews.title: Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Works well. For top debris. Not so well with dog hair
customer_reviews.author: Adelina Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Works much better on short nap rugs than on the bare floor
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this product since it was a Rubbermaid product but I did find the following problems: You have to be very careful when tightening the handle since the slightest pressure will strip the threads. Product seems to, at times, push small items rather than pick them up. Works much better on short nap rugs than on the bare floor.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly L Carrington

customer_reviews.title: 12/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for my old office sweeper. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Karli C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Entirely as promoted: easy to use, functions well, just hard to get brushes out to clean. Still happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: kgbcolor

customer_reviews.title: Handle NOT able to attach to sweeper body
customer_reviews.text: Sweeper looks fine. Have had Rubbermaid sweepers in the past. Item delivered in good shape. Handle is NOT able to attach to the body of the sweeper. Threads inside handle are wrong size or inserted backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Imagine T.

customer_reviews.title: works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an amazon daily deal. I know it is not a regular vacuum but great for quick pick ups and such without the hassle of the big vacuum and cords, etc, etc. I think this does a more than excellent job. Picks up more than I anticipated. I have a dog so there is some dog hair. VERY PLEASED and very convenient. JUST what I needed. Good price too! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: chicago doug

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid Commercial Galvanized Steel Floor and Carpet Sweeper, 9.5-Inch L x 8-Inch W x 44-Inch
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever used. It doesn't do anything. It does not pick up dust, dirt, or anything that it supposed to do. Waste of money! I gave it one star but what I want to give it is I no star in my opinion. This is poorly made-- a broom or swifter does more than this contraption.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work. It does an ok job but doesn't fully pick up everything. It's nice that it comes with a little brush to clean off sweeper, but it does not pick up dog hair.. At all. I was a waitress for many years and certainly know my way around a carpet sweeper... This was not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elmer

customer_reviews.title: Sweeper fail
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper was horrible. All it did was pick up dust on the floor. If you have a spotless house and just need to get rid of some dust bunnies, this is the product for you. However if you LIVE in your home and have stuff on the floor like cereal, this sweeper won’t even touch it. It just pushes it around.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great, even picks up pine needles. My only complaints are that it leaves behind about half the pet hair and absolutely refuses feathers.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Perosa

customer_reviews.title: PUSH IT AND ZIPP YOU ARE FINISHED
customer_reviews.text: AT LAST, SOMETHING THAT STAND UP TO TODAY'S TRAFFIC. THIS IS GREAT ON ANY SURFACE.
customer_reviews.author: M T BRISCOLE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, so convient for my kids to help around the house
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is a greater product. Reduces my work hours and does the job while people are still working in the office areas.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I am so in love with this little piece of heaven
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this little piece of heaven. I bought it for work because it's such a chore to drag out the vacuum every day. Now all I have to do is pull this out and do a quick once over and I'm done. It works amazingly on the low pile carpet and the floors. It also came with the brush cleaning tool that is so simple to use. I did a lot of reading on reviews before I purchased and I'm glad I did, this one was highly recommended and I am adding to that list too. I would highly recommend this, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine G.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed something to clean up my little living area, and a vacuum cleaner was just overkill. I have to say I am impressed with this bad boy. It does a better job than my vacuum on low pile carpets. You can fold the arm all the way down to fit it under very low clearance furniture. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Good and power efficient.
customer_reviews.text: works just like the old ones did. cleans up the crumbs after the dog has had his bone.
customer_reviews.author: A Gottschald

customer_reviews.title: ... majority of similar items so it must be really good quality and do really great job
customer_reviews.text: i compared this to many similar items so i thought to myself its more expensive than the majority of similar items so it must be really good quality and do really great job. Not the case at all. the handle is not very sturdy. its an ok, average item and not what its cracked out to be!
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Athletics

customer_reviews.title: Great little helper
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, picks up nicely. Not a vacuum, but great for quick cleanup. Light enough to carry to different spots that need just a sprucing up. Easy to empty the bins, and back in action literally within a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Mary, Ashland

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!!! Just what i needed for a quick clean up..... instead of pulling out the vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted it to be.  I didn't have to plug it in and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for those touch ups without hauling out the vacuum cleaners. Easy to grab from the corner of thecloset and put it to use without plugging it in. Low tech brilliantly useful without having to replace batteries or plug in. Does a super job. Not perfect - but what is!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lottie37

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine
customer_reviews.text: Used by my cleaning girl but she left without comment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love, love, love this
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely pleased with my purchase of this. I have been wanting one of these for a long time for quick clean ups when everyone is asleep. I use this on a daily basis multiple times a day. Works great on picking up little pieces of kitty litter the mats don't get. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: momof5

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper works great I am glad I purchased it. Love how easy it is to use and clean. The roller brush is a must and I use it a lot. thanks John
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: It is not perfect suction device but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: So many reviews for sweepers UGH! don't read them all. Just know, it works! Why do people say it doesn't? I have no idea! Are they not pushing hard enough? It is not perfect suction device but it gets the job done. It is handy to have. It is not as lightweight as I would like but I didn't look at that when I bought it. It feels sturdy. It is not to completely replace a dust mop or vacuum but is great so you don't feel like a slob during the week. And I repeat, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Result
customer_reviews.text: I never think of getting this sweeper before getting it. But it was on sale last month. And I decided to give it a try. I used it for my bedroom carpet... and I was like WOW ~~~ I think I bedroom was very clean... but after using this, I was amazed about how much and what it could pick up from my carpet... I would definitely recommend this product... especially for someone like me, who prefer not to use the vacuum because it is heavy and noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Quick clean up
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered multiple floor and carpet sweepers for our hospital. Employees ask for them so they can do quick clean ups in their offices. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Val Y

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This carpet sweeper works very well. After six months of daily use picking up the various things that my sons deposit on the floor it still works as well as it did on day one. Not a replacement for a good vacuum but it is good for those little messes that you don't feel like getting the vacuum out for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for quick clean ups
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for quick clean ups. I have all tile floors and have a little trouble in the grout lines. I had one before for years and loved it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: in short the sweeper is as advertised and I highly recommend it for the smaller jobs around the house
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality and the effectiveness of this sweeper. It did the job without incident. I had no problem with the handle as others have. It is the right weight and size, in short the sweeper is as advertised and I highly recommend it for the smaller jobs around the house.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY D SCHMIDT

customer_reviews.title: On sale price.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Dose a great job. Cleans multiple floors. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Handy for Quick Clean up
customer_reviews.text: Saw this style sweeper in the building manager's office and was used for quick clean up in the lobby. I was impressed, and I ordered one. So far so goo. This is just what I want and need, when I did not want to bring out the vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I tried it myself here at work and it worked great on rugs and tile floor
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for one of these as I had seen them at work used by our cleaning people. I tried it myself here at work and it worked great on rugs and tile floor. Looked at Home Depot, Lowes and other places and could not find it until I went on Amazon. It is worth the money not having to drag out the vacuum for every little crumb or piece of dirt. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon - Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Works great on our low pile rugs and on the tile ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the convenience store I work at. Works great on our low pile rugs and on the tile floor also. I gave it 4 stars only because I wish they make them a bit heavier like the old ones use to be.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hale

customer_reviews.title: For a push sweeper, this one works well. ...
customer_reviews.text: For a push sweeper, this one works well. We use it on very low commercial carpet, and it picks up the visible things very well. I wonder how it will do over time as it wears.
customer_reviews.author: funmumk

customer_reviews.title: Only one rolling brush but works well
customer_reviews.text: For years we used a two-brush Bissell sweeper that did the job until it's two rollers became too worn. I was a little concerned that this one has only one rolling brush, but it does a good job on rugs and tile floors. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ichabod

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial Dual Action Mechanical Sweeper, Black/Yellow, FG421388BLA
product_meta.description: Style:Dual ActionThe Rubbermaid Commercial Products Dual Action Mechanical Carpet Sweeper contains 2 types of bristle brush rolls for to collect dust, dirt and debris from carpets. This carpet sweeper is made from durable galvanized steel and ABS plastic and works well for bare floors and low-pile carpets. Efficient 7.5-in. sweep path, plus rubber bumper to protect furniture and walls.
feature_bullets: 2 types of bristle brush rolls to collect dust, dirt and debris
Made of galvanized steel and ABS plastic
Works on bare floors or low-pile carpet
Low-profile design provides easy access around and under furniture
